mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(userId, userPass, userName, gender, level, phone) values(#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName}, #{gender}, #{level}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select userId, userPass, userName, level, phone from tbl_member where userId = #{userId}
select userName from tbl_member where userName = #{userName}
select userId, userName, userPass, regDate, level from tbl_member where userId = #{userId} and userPass = #{userPass}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set userId = #{userId}, userName = #{userName}, userPass = #{userPass}, level = #{level}, phone = #{phone} where userId = #{userId}
